trident.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a weapon with three points that looks like a large fork
trident.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a powerful type of missile developed in the US. It carries nuclear explosives, is fired from submarines, and can attack several different places at the same time.
trident.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a type of chewing gum without any sugar in it, sold in the US
